title: unesco_heritage_Vlkolínec
text:
Name: Vlkolínec. short_description:

Vlkolínec, situated in the centre of Slovakia, is a remarkably intact settlement of 45 buildings with the traditional features of a central European village. It is the region’s most complete group of these kinds of traditional log houses, often found in mountainous areas.

. date_inscribed: 1993. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 19.27833333. latitude: 49.03916667. area_hectares: 4.9. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Slovakia. Region: Europe and North America. iso_code: sk. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: rev.
